content: Trick-or-treaters will be flocking to your house when they see the Star Wars candy holders loaded up with goodies. Each candy holder has been decorated with painstaking detail to resemble the actual movie characters and add a fun touch to any haunted home.

The giant bag of marshmallows. When you absolutely, positively got to rot every healthy tooth in your mouth, accept no substitutes. This enormous bag gives you eight pounds of sugar, corn syrup, and other processed ingredients to make your heart smile and your teeth decay.

Prepare for space travel and pledge your allegiance to ZOLTAN! with the bubble wrap suit. Inspired by the space suits from “Dude Where’s My Car?”, this plastic suit envelops you from head to toe in bubble wrap that you’ll be hard pressed to not pop.

Transform any mini pumpkin this Halloween into the great Darth Vader with this geeky pumpkin push-in kit. An excellent gift for Star Wars fans, simply paint a mini pumpkin a menacing shade of black and stick the push-in pieces in to bring the infamous Darth Vader to life.

Even those unfortunate enough to be born stache-less can sport some distinguished facial hair with the mustache sunglasses. The sunglasses offer 100% UV protection and come available in various mustache styles and colors. They’re great for any occasion.

With the cat GPS tracking collar you’ll be able to give your feline friends the independence they crave without losing track of them. The collar is lightweight, designed to fit comfortably, and provides proactive health monitoring charts in addition to the GPS function.

The green toy snowboarders finally provide an answer as to what our green army men do when they’re not in the middle of imaginary combat. These radical little green dudes come with their special gear – snowboards – and are ready to bust some serious air.

The old and new clash beautifully to bring you your favorite tunes with the cardboard boombox. This retro amplifier is easy to assemble and provides an effective way of playing your favorite music out loud. It’s stylish, unique, and way lighter than a real boombox.

The first slice of watermelon will taste better than ever when you cut it with the watermelon knife. This functional novelty knife makes slicing watermelon a blast. It features a razor sharp Japanese carbon steel blade whimsically designed with seed-shaped accents.

Treat your guests to the lap of luxury when they sleep over on the inflatable pull out couch. This lightweight couch can easily be moved into any room and accommodates to any situation. Providing a comfortable backrest and armrest for sitting down and ample space for sleeping.

Contribute to the late Mr. Fring’s thriving fast food empire by purchasing a Los Pollos Hermanos air freshener. The air freshener displays the iconic Los Pollos Hermanos logo and features a delightful pine scent to keep your car smelling springtime fresh.

Celebrate your unique brand of love like only a couple of off-beat soul mates can – with the creepy wedding cake toppers. The topper serves as the perfect touch to any cake and is sure to be a hit among guests once they get a peek at the unicorn bride and horse groom.

Complete the final touches on your contemporary bathroom with these black toilet paper rolls. The black toilet paper provides the same functionality and wiping comfort as a standard roll, while adding a sleek accent that will surely be the talk of your household.

Outfit your bicycle with a handy GPS system by installing the handlebar iPhone holder. The holder firmly attaches your iPhone to the handlebar to provide a convenient way of accessing your phone’s GPS or other useful apps while you are riding your bicycle.

You can’t reinvent the wheel, but you can redesign the shovel as seen with the ergonomic shovel. This revolutionary shovel design was built with proper body mechanics in mind, so you can shovel easier and suffer less back pain afterwards.

Bow to your sensei! The American flag pants with tapered ankles will provide comfort, style, flexibility, and raw intimidation power – you think anybody wants a roundhouse kick to the face while you’re wearing these bad boys? Forget about it.

With the Ninja Turtles dresses you’ll be able to dress up as your favorite hero in a half shell while still pulling off a cute outfit. The dress is made from a tight form fitting cotton and is available in either Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, or Raphael style.

Turn your tiny tot into an adorable little carry-on when travelling with the car seat transporter. The car seat transporter converts your baby’s car seat into a portable and light weight stroller you can roll through the airport quickly to avoid missing your flight.

Now you can place a <del>passive aggressive</del> friendly reminder on your toilet seat to keep it placed in the down position with this easy stick decal. Once applied, the sticker has been shown to assist in lowering divorce rates by as much as 22.48%!

Great Odin’s raven! Ron Burgundy is back – in action figure form! The legendary Channel 4 newscaster returns in all his glory to bring you the latest news, drink good Scotch and share insights from his epic career. And if there’s time, he’ll also play some  jazz flute.

Poke fun at all the bumper sticker families on the road with the hungry T-Rex car decal. The decal depicts a ferocious T-Rex devouring a lovely stick figure family. And if that’s not enough, it also features a caption flat out stating how delicious they were.

Harness mother nature’s fruits like never before with the keg tap kit. Now you’ll be able to appease the gods of the autumn ales by pouring their succulent nectar into a keg worthy of the name. It’s the festive and eco-friendly way to store and dispense booze.

Keep your fur covered friend nice and cool during the hot summer months with the misting dog leash. Simply fill the ten ounce water bottle attached to the leash and watch as it delivers a gentle misting spray to cool down your dog. A must have for any active dog owner.

Get the privacy you need by taking the portable door lock everywhere you go. This handy device installs in seconds without any tools to provide a dependable lock whenever the need arises. It’s a great way to add a bit of extra security to the home and works even better for travel.

There’s no better way to pound some spooky Halloween beers than with the skull beer bong. Once the desired brew is poured into the top of the skull, it travels down the spinal cord and into your parched mouth to deliver frightening levels of inebriation.

Apart from water, the solar powered backpack charger is one accessory your don’t want to be without when venturing into the wild. This compact and lightweight charger easily fits in any bag and provides enough juice to charge up to four different electronic devices.

Having trouble staying awake on the job? Try the world’s largest coffee mug. This mammoth porcelain mug holds the equivalent of twenty regulars cups of coffee, so just a single serving will have you so wired you’ll reach new levels of productivity – or possibly have a heart attack.

Dress up like fast food royalty with the Burger King mask. This one-size-fits-all vinyl mask covers the front and sides of your head with the King’s familiar over-sized face and majestic golden crown. You’ll be treated like a God anytime you step in a fast food joint.

If minimalistic elegance is your aim, then the faceless watch will be right up your alley. This watch’s intrepid design eliminates the bulky face in favor of a digital LED display built right into the band. It’s understatement at its finest and most stylish.

Show off your love for Sanrio’s famous feline with the Hello Kitty backpack. This adorable plush backpack is styled to look like an over-sized version of the iconic Hello Kitty’s head. At ten inches in length, it’s the ideal size to carry around your daily gear.

Show off your patriotism like a true red blooded ‘Murican with the bald eagle fighter pilot t-shirt. Nothing says you’re from the greatest country in the world quite like a bald eagle fighter pilot posing against the old red, white, and blue while kick-ass jets soar in the background.

With the perfect hard boiled egg timer the days of guesstimating cooking time for your eggs are over. The hard boiled egg timer goes directly into the pot with the real eggs and calculates cooking stages to determine when the eggs are cooked and ready.

Camouflage yourself from the undead with the zombie blood shower gel. Bathing with their gooey green innards will mask your scent and make you virtually invisible to zombies. It’s the sure fire way to blend in and avoid becoming a human happy meal.

Conquer whatever environment you’re placed in with the multi-tool survival shovel. Crafted from heavy duty stainless steel, this extremely versatile shovel functions as five different tools, such as a hammer, a saw, and a knife. The great outdoors won’t stand a chance.

You didn’t choose the pug life – the pug life chose you. And now that you’ve embraced your new adorable canine lifestyle, you can truly look the part with this hyper realistic pug mask. Now go out there and sniff some stranger’s dog’s ass!

Now you can play a classic strategy game in a brand new light with the light up chess set. This high tech chess board features a sleek black playing surface and specially designed translucent game pieces that light up when placed on top of the board.

Now you can save on electricity and get a nice forearm workout going when you shred your documents using these shredder scissors. They’re perfect for slicing and dicing up documents, credit cards, and especially evidence that links you to insider trading.

Now you can have the great Tony Stark help your kids get over their fear of the dark with the Iron Man 3D lamp. This battery operated light makes it seem as if Iron Man has crashed through the wall like the Kool-Aid man to provide some ambient lighting.

When there’s a shindig on the horizon, count on the Moby Dick party picks to make a splash among your guests. What better way to harpoon those delicious cheese cubes and party snacks than with pint sized water spout picks straight out of the whale’s blowhole.

The Hulk statue lets you take home everyone’s favorite Avenger without fear that he’ll turn your house to rubble. This amazingly detailed statue stands at nearly 10″ and displays every muscle of the Hulk’s massive body in a stance that suggests he’s ready to hulk out.

Keep your silky hair tangle free and your liver over-saturated with alcohol with the hairbrush flask. This 6 oz. flask is shaped like a functional paddle brush but it unscrews at the bottom any time you’re in need of a little pick-me-up. No one will ever suspect your raging alcoholism.

Getting out on the water will be easier than ever before thanks to the modular kayak. This top quality kayak accommodates up to two people and disassembles into three pieces for easy transportation. You’ll be able to take the kayak to virtually any destination.

For a successful day at the pool, always remember safety rule number #1: Make sure your alcoholic beverage is safe and secure at all times. Decorated in a fun nautical color, this pint sized drink preserver cradles your drink and keeps it upright and floating at all times.

Waterproofing your life may be easier than you think – all it takes is a few cans of liquid repellent. This specialized spray works on a variety of surfaces including concrete, wood, and fabric to guard against the nasty weather mother nature throws your way.

Keep your eyes on the road, look out for tailgaters, and navigate all at the same time with the touchscreen rear view mirror with a built in GPS navigation system. The discrete screen also helps avoid theft as the rear view mirror does not attract extra attention.

Get serious about party time with the giant red party cup. The traditional sixteen ounce has now been super-sized for the professional party-er – you’ll now be capable of holding up to six beers in a single cup, so you can focus more on drinking and less on refilling.

One, two, three, four, I declare thumb sumo wrestler war! The great American sport of thumb wrestling has now been integrated with the ancient competitive sport of sumo wrestling thanks to these rubber thumb attaching sumo wrestler bodies.

With the collapse of modern civilization imminent, you can’t afford to be without the proper protection. With this intimidating riot gear equipped, you’ll be able to handle anything  the post apocalyptic world throws at you – from looters to hordes of zombies.

Quit lugging around bulky flasks – now you can be an alcoholic on the go without feeling encumbered thanks to these lightweight disposable drinking flasks. These innovative pouches are collapsible and re-usable, so you can get inebriated every single day!

Make family game night something to look forward to with the giant Connect Four game. This four foot version multiplies the fun of this classic game and is made out of durable plastic, ideal for placing in the backyard or taking to the park.

The solar powered garden zombie works wonderfully whether your aim is to scare off intruders or just keep the yard well lit. This gruesome zombie holds up a solar powered lantern as he tries to rise up and escape from his backyard grave.

Relive the great adventure in Middle Earth with the Lord of the Rings themed LEGO sets. With everything from the Shire to the Mines of Moria, each set will provide you with hours of fun as you construct the iconic locations and wage combat between the forces of good and evil.

Power up your boring old deck with the Super Mario playing cards. Each deck contains retro 8-bit graphics of Mario and the gang – even the numbers and suits are digitized. It makes a great gift for the old school gamer who enjoys card games.

Freak out friends and family by hanging the scary silhouette shower curtain in your guest bathroom. The shadowy and psychotic figure looming just outside will keep guests on their toes with a healthy dose of paranoia as they try to have a relaxing shower.

The retro Pac-Man ghost poncho will thrill and terrify your friends who are dressed like Pac-Man. This ghost poncho is shaped just like a ghost from the old school video game that you loved wasting quarters on as a kid. As a bonus, it repels rain pretty well.

Strap on the ultra comfortable cheeseburger earmuffs and use junk food for something other than clogging your arteries. These comfy and savory looking earmuffs come with all the fixings you need to bundle up and stay warm – all on two plump cotton buns.

Achieve the same barber shop level shave from the comfort of home with the precision laser beard trimmer. This high-tech trimmer features a bright red laser guide to assist you in creating the exact look you’re going for. It’s manscaping for the modern man.

Brighten up a loved one’s already special day by upstaging the cake with the ultimate birthday cake candles. Upon being lit, the candle blooms to reveal two rows of brightly lit petals that spin around while a delightful “birthday song” melody plays.

Increase your endurance when you start biking with the Iron Man cycling jersey. With a flashy design worthy of the Stark name, this jersey is engineered with the latest in quick-dry technology to provide unsurpassed comfort and performance when you need it most.

Provide your playful pussy cat with hours of quality entertainment with the cat whac-a-mole toy. You control a cute little felt mouse on a stick and get him to poke his face out of one of the holes until your cat swats it away. It’s just like the arcade version for humans.

The tattoo oven mitt will make you look as tough as an old time sailor, even while baking muffins. This protective mitt keeps your hands safe when cooking with hot pots and pans, and gives you the tattooed sleeves and muscley forearms you’ve always dreamed of having.

This is the future of food. It provides everything the body needs in a balanced and nutritional drinkable meal. Soylent is a liquid food that tastes like nothing, but provides you with an easy to make healthy meal at your disposal.

With the Kick-Ass costume you’ll be able to patrol the streets while simultaneously collecting tons of candy from the neighborhood you protect. Whether you decide to use the costume in the name of justice or gluttony, you’ll look Kick-Ass either way.

Own a piece of cinematic history when you purchase one of the original Ghostbusters jumpsuits. Your collection’s value will skyrocket with the addition of this actual movie prop – as it’s the same suit worn by the great Dr. Egon Spengler in Ghostbusters 2.

Dress your offspring like the pint sized warrior that he is with the Ninja Turtles onesie. Each onesie features an adorable little shell on the back and comes available in four distinct styles, so you can choose your favorite Ninja Turtle or alternate between all four.

With the glow in the dark lighter by your side, the days of fumbling around the dark looking for a lighter are over. Each disposable lighter emits a playful glow that makes the lighter easy to spot from anywhere in the room. It also doubles as a cool glow stick at parties.

Take advantage of your dog’s hyperactivity with the tennis ball bazooka. This lightweight bazooka is specially designed to launch tennis balls up to 30 feet with the pull of a trigger. Now you’ll be able to play until your pup gets tired without straining your throwing arm.

Improve visibility when working in tight and dark environments with the hand mounted flashlight. The flashlight conveniently mounts onto the hand and eliminates the need to have someone else holding the light for you. You’ll be able to point the light exactly where you need.

With the manly diaper bag at your disposal, you can take care of your your baby while on the go without losing any man points. This masculine diaper bad looks just like a tool belt and features a multitude of conveniently placed pockets to assist you with your little rugrat.

The expedition sky flare is one gadget you don’t want to forget next time you adventure in the outdoors. Every launch serves the dual purpose of entertaining or signaling others for help as it shines like a bright beacon impossible to miss in the dead of night.

Now the handyman in your house will never have to be far from their beloved tools when they begin eating with the wrench utensil set. These handy utensils feature a sturdy stainless steel build and are shaped like various tools on the at the base.

titleEN: Come Back With A Warrant Doormat
content: Send a strong message to the police to stay out of your home with the “come back with a warrant” doormat. It let’s you exercise your rights as a ‘Murican by reminding anyone who walks up to the door, that unless they’ve got a warrant, entry into your home ain’t happenin’.

Petrify the neighborhood children with horror when you sneak up on them wearing the Slender Man costume. This one piece lycra costume disguises you from head to toe in Slender Man’s trademark black suit and tie accompanied by his disturbing blank face.

Redefine the way you spend your days tailgating before the big game with the ultimate portable tailgate cooler. With features like a special cooler compartment and space for all your grilling tools, this incredible cooler includes everything you need for a day at the game.

Complete your trick-or-treat route in record time when you dress your offspring in the kids Iron Man costume. Dressed from head to toe in the Mark VI, your kid will jet by each house so fast they’ll be able to hit every spot on the block without even breaking a sweat.

When feeling lonely or scared in the dark, the bioluminescent dinosaur pet will keep you company better than any dog or cat ever could. This futuristic prehistoric pet photosynthesizes during the day in order to emit a nice healthy glow at night – and makes a great night light.

Be honest – do these pants make my edible stomach area look fat? These novelty cupcake molds are styled to look like a pair of jeans that create the illusion your snack has totally let themselves go and grown a hefty yet scrumptious muffin top.

Add a bit of spark to your plain wardrobe and show support for the Autobots with the fashionable Transformers Bumblebee Hoodie. This comfy sweater is decorated to look like the fearless Autobot warrior when zipped all the way up.

Admirers of the incredibly well known “Keep Calm” slogan will love to slumber with the Keep Calm bedspread. This stylish bedspread comes in a variety of colors to match any decor and displays a modified “Keep Calm It’s Time For Bed” slogan.

If you’re starving, nothing will carve up that delicious pie faster than the scooter pizza cutter. This novelty cutter comes shaped like a traditional pizza delivery scooter that contains a razor sharp wheel great for portioning your pizza without making a mess.

Get pre-historic with snack time using these dinosaur cookie cutters. Featuring templates of everyone’s favorite dinosaurs – such as the T-Rex and the Triceratops – these unique cookie cutters are perfect for making some tasty treats that will bite back!

titleEN: How Not To Kill Your Baby Book
content: Keeping your baby alive is no easy task. They are weak, defenseless, and act like little drunk people. To help you on this daunting task is the “How Not To Kill Your Baby” instructional booklet. In no time at all you’ll be an expert of your child’s survival.

Keep your furry friend properly hydrated wherever you two venture off to with the dog water bottle. The water bottle folds out so the water can flow onto a long plastic bowl, so your dog can drink comfortably without requiring you to carry around a bulky traditional doggy bowl.

Wood you ever wear a wooden tie? If you like to go against the grain, splinter away from the norm and pick up a wooden tie for you or your loved one. It will never wrinkle or stain, it will look great with your formal flannel, and you won’t even have to google how to tie it.

Satisfy your sweet tooth without consuming a single calorie every time you wear this colorful Nerds dress. This fun and stylish dress comes with the Nerds logo and graphic printed over the entire front just like the original candy, and comes in either pink or purple.

Fans of Mexican wrestling and heavy drinking are in for a real treat with the wrestler headlock bottle opener. This mighty warrior from south of the border comes dressed from head to toe in his battle suit, ready to pop open beer bottles with the signature headlock.

Why settle for poorly built sand castles when you can construct monuments with the world landmark sand molds. No other kid on the beach will be able to compete against the magnificent creations your offspring erects with remarkable ease.

Stay groovy and inebriated at any concert or festival with the  tie dye beer belt. This far-out beer belt holds  up to six beers around your waist so that you can effortlessly re-supply your mouth after you’ve guzzled down your current can of the sweet nectar known as beer.

Get down and dirty while you ironically get clean with the breasts shower gel dispenser. The risque gel dispenser makes the perfect addition to any bachelor’s bathroom, as it lets you squeeze a pair of voluptuous and supple breasts every time you need some soap.

No game themed bedroom would be complete without the Super Mario Bros Thwomp pillow. Instead of crushing you with their mighty power, this comfortable pillow will accent your room with a fun nostalgic touch while providing a cozy place to rest your head.

Increase your odds of survival once the apocalypse breaks begins with the bio-hazard reticle. Once you strap on the reticle it will provide a bright red biohazard sight that will help you take aim on the infected – just remember to conserve your ammo.

Take your love of America’s favorite pastime from the field to your living room with the baseball glove chair. It’s designed to look like an enlarged version of a classic Rawlings baseball glove and offers more comfort than your favorite worn in mitt.

The windshield display GPS conveniently projects directions and other useful information onto your car’s windshield so you can keep their eyes on the road while receiving guidance. With a quick glance, you’ll be able to see all the information you’ll need.

They may not be the safest, but the carpet slide shoes definitely make households covered in carpet a whole lot more fun. These slippery shoes contain a special sole that have a similar effect on carpet that socks have on a hardwood floor – strap on and let the good times <del>fall</del> roll.

The periodic beer glass is the intellectual’s mug of choice. It displays the beryllium and erbium elements whose symbols coincidentally also spell out beer. More importantly, they help demonstrate how chemistry can be fun when applied to the real world.

The shot and chaser shot glass enables party goers and alcohol enthusiasts to seamlessly transition from shot to chaser in one fluid movement. Cut on lag time and minimize the strong taste of alcohol so you reach ‘blackout drunk’ levels in no time at all.

If Spot is a flight risk every time he’s out of the house, then the sausage link leash is just what you need to keep him by your side. The leash is designed to look like a string of succulent sausage links that look so tasty, no dog would ever think of running away from.

Prepare yourself for a successful career in the world of aviation by getting behind the wheel of the radio control Airbus plane. They’re decorated exactly like the planes you see at the airport and offer a fun alternative to standard R/C model planes.

Bulky chargers won’t clutter your outlets anymore when you install these rotating wall outlets. These innovative wall outlets properly cater to your modern lifestyle by rotating 360 degrees so you can plug virtually anything in without blocking the other outlet.

Rebuild Westeros piece by piece with this Game Of Thrones 3D Map Puzzle. Featuring all of the iconic locations such as King’s Landing and Winterfell, this map puzzle lets you learn the geographical details of the land of dragons and gratuitous boob shots.
